entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is the other participant in the Triwizard Cup competition. He is described as being taller and having longer legs than Harry, indicating that he is a strong competitor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story. He is trying to reach the Triwizard Cup first but is struggling to catch up with Cedric.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The Triwizard Cup is a trophy that the participants are competing for. It is described as being gleaming and located on a plinth a hundred yards away.

relationships.description: Harry and Cedric are competing against each other to reach the Triwizard Cup first. This is evident from their actions, as they are both sprinting towards the cup.
